name: Loose Caboose
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam!

Try to stop the broken and uncontrollable train from crashing into any objects by moving them off the track as the train slowly gets faster!

Controls: E - Cut down tree on track, H - Hold down to blow whistle, ESC - Back to menu

Credit: I made all of the art and wrote all the code but the sounds where provided from:

https://www.edinburghrecords.com/free-sound-effects/, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1N304T5oLw, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYmb81BfQSE, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZMsGLkVVw4g,

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wjfNNXsaSBs, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xOxBGcZRO0M, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5DiqyY0uTuoga, https://opengameart.org/content/interface-sounds-starter-pack, https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/fantasy-game-loop/
